hadith.chapter: Virtues and Merits of the Prophet (pbuh) and his Companions - كتاب المناقب
hadith.arabic-text: حدثني محمد بن بشار، حدثنا يحيى، وابن، مهدي قالا حدثنا شعبة، مثله وإذا كره شيئا عرف في وجهه‏.‏
hadith.english-text: Narrated Shuba: A similar Hadith (i e. No. 762) with this addition: And if he (i.e. the Prophet) disliked something, the sign of aversion would appear on his face.
